name: Forgiveness
description:
hurt. bloods. sins. forgive. forgiven.
how many times can you forgive someone, like your friends maybe. 100 times? more than that? less? never?
how many times had you been forgiven by them? less than yours? more?
painful? dissapointing? guilty?

png / 3000 x 3000
100 pieces for celebrating 100 friends on twitter. thank you so much!
